stimulusHtml: Which of the following is true at the quantity of labor hired by a profit-maximizing monopsonist?
choicesHtml: Marginal revenue product is less than marginal factor cost.
Marginal revenue product is greater than marginal factor cost.
Marginal revenue product is less than the market wage.
Marginal revenue product is greater than the market wage.
Marginal revenue product equals the market wage.
